chicken.name: Live Chicken
chicken.description: A domestic fowl kept for its eggs or meat, especially a young one.

chicken.name: Raw Chicken
chicken.description: An uncooked chicken. Raw chicken is often contaminated with Campylobacter bacteria and sometimes with Salmonella and Clostridium perfringens bacteria.

chicken.name: Cucco
chicken.description: A cucco can be found in the vast land of Hyrule. If you attack them, they'll form a revenge squad and end you.'

chicken.name: Stardew Valley Chicken
chicken.description: A chicken from Marnie's Ranch in Stardew Valley. There are 4 different colors of chickens: white, brown, blue, and void.

chicken.name: Chicken Little
chicken.description: A young chicken who throws his small town into panic by claiming the sky is falling. Discovers that his town will be invaded by aliens.

chicken.name: Chicken Little
chicken.description: A young chicken who throws his small town into panic by claiming the sky is falling. Discovers that his town will be invaded by aliens.
